string.name: bif
string.b: Economic Disadvantage: Exploitation often leads to economic hardships. Men, like women, can experience job insecurity, low wages, and poor working conditions, which directly impact their quality of life and economic stability. Political Disillusionment: Continuous exploitation by the political class can lead to disillusionment with the political system. When promises are broken, and corruption is prevalent, it erodes trust in political leaders and institutions.

string.name: gif
string.b: Exploitation reinforces gender inequality by perpetuating power imbalances and limiting opportunities for women. Rejecting exploitation is a step towards achieving true gender equality in all spheres of life.

string.name: they
string.b: In summary, rejecting exploitation is essential for women\'s economic, social, and political empowerment. It is a necessary step towards achieving gender equality, protecting human rights, and building a fairer and more just society for all.
